line_2: With antic Sports, and blue-eyed Pleasures,
With antic Sports and blue-eyed Pleasures,

line_1: When the first Knock would break His Measures,
line_2: And stop his Rise to Place and Treasures.
One fill'd with pain, and one with pleasures;

line_1: Nor even hop'd to change men's measures,
line_2: Or frighten ladies from their pleasures.
